title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Honestly Riot just get rid of Legend of the Poro King its so bad. just aram with a big poro... and we havnt played urf in ages hurry with it aye
P.S. Bring back Doom Bots please.

Doom has got to be a bigger thing than just RGM
cos it uses the separate Co-op vs AI Lobby. Maybe level 20-30 summoner is required to unlock the mode and all days of the week.
{{champion:115}} bring back doom bots{{champion:115}}
ALL RANDOM URF AGAINST DOOM BOTS PLS
We gotta get a One For All and URF gamemode!
STOLE MY IDEA!!! ;-; BUT YES WE NEED IT
omg yes All random URF sounds dope as

This is what we've been waiting for - URF has finally come!!! HALLELUJAH!!!

It's also nice too see that it's all random, so that people don't stick to the same few champs.
was wondering if they could add game modes together?? like all for one and urf that would just be hectic and fun soooo maybe???{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
does this mean we get arurf three weeks in a row since we got nexus siege 3 times in a row
This is exactly what was wanted rito, thank you.

Swear to god i dont care so much that you held of urf. i mean yeah i love it and it pisses me off but i can wait. I get that you dont want to overdo it.... BUT IF I SEE LEGEND OF THE PORO KING ONE MORE FKING TIME IM GOING TO LOSE MY SH!T. ITS LITERALLY ARAM WITH A FAT PORO..... THATS IT!. ARAM BUT WITH A FAT PORO.... DITCH IT AND PUT SOMETHING PEOPLE ARE ACTUALLY REQUESTING PLEASE! YOU HOLD URF OFF SO WE DONT GET SICK OF IT. THEN DO THE SAME WITH THAT STUPID FAT KING PLEASE!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Is like =-= All random URF like...URF? XD
Waiting for the One For All URF :)
yup rip fps lol
I've wanted aram rift forever. But aram urf? My dream's come true! We need more extra settings like this for modes.
Aram rift is a custom already :)
Nobody plays it, ever...

here's my feedback:
1. stop bringing back poro king because it's basically aram, just with picking champs
2. twisted treeline is not big enough for 12 people, take hexakill back to summoners rift
3. having a more balanced rotation would help (instead of having hexakill out like 8 times and urf only 2, well soon to be 3)
Best feedback out of whole year.

Saying that Poro king isn't different enough to be a game mode and then requesting that hexakill is changed back to SR? 1 extra person per team doesn't change gameplay enough on SR, i guess maybe if they added even more players it could be something fun but I'd rather it stay on TT if it's just hexakill, at least that changes gameplay quite significantly.
fk me rito y all random, WE WANT NORMAN URF{{champion:99}}

Sorry, but your norman is in another Hoenn region faw away in Pokemon.
not Mario.
aha ya got me xD
Nexus siege still sucks but I'm looking forward to ARURF
i wish there would just be some normal 5v5 urf
yeh normal urf was the best

ARURF
RIOT THANKS ILL SEND U NUDES ;)
Mind send me some 2 <3 xD

Omg these guys in Oce...
Freaking zombies for urf...
*even these guys
just waiting sitting here doing nothing until ARURF comes out 23 today ;-;
wtf is this? nexus siege goes 3 times before urf goes more then 1 time.................. riot must really hate us all.

how to fix the modes, hexakill on summoners rift, urf not aram, poro king replaced by black market brawlers and 
{{champion:17}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:83}} banned automatically during urf so u can ban some non meta people and still have fun. and never forget about {{item:3222}}
URF on twisted treeline with 20 players please.
Haha you can't just make whatever you want. The game will be almost unplayable with the Frames Per Second with 20 people casting abilities with 80% cooldown Reduction.

TBH All those people being mad about Nexus Siege and Poro King should just stfu and if they dont like it dont play it... also to all those people hating more and about aram urf be grateful they are actually bringing urf back. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Can I just say thank you! Riot this is great, we've wanted URF for ages and it's going to be great on ARAM this time. But to the people who are being negative about Poro King, if you don't like it don't play it. Thank you Riot, maybe next time we can get it a little bit earlier? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
are you going to put it black market as well? for us to play if anyone knows what im talking about.
what map will this be on?
One for all- hexakill- URF would be fun. or just Ultra rapid fire and hexakill on the frickin normal map, Ascension is my favorite, no more of this game mode please, what a disappointing weekend imo.
I like how riot is spicing things up a bit, but it would be cool if i could play some actual urf
OFA map?
